entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
